p: Another 1 mL portion was taken and collected in a plastic bottle to which 9 mL of 10% formalin solution was added, it was then kept at 4Â°C for counting bacteria, fungi and protozoa population using the total direct count technique according to the method of Galyen [ 17]. Ten mL of Blood were taken from the jugular vein of each animal and immediately kept on ice and transported to the laboratory for analyzing blood urea nitrogen (BUN) using the technique of Crocker [ 18].
